title: Dark Mercy
description: The Masters of Mercy Club would like to issue you an invitation.Entry into San Francisco’s newest hot spot is by invite only, but that hasn’t kept journalist Cassandra Davis from digging into what is really going on behind the walls of the ultra-exclusive venue. When its mysterious owner Richard Guildford finally grants her an interview, Cassandra is determined to uncover his secrets.But it's Cassandra’s secrets that interest Richard. The curious little reporter may seem tough, but he can see right through her. He knows exactly how to satisfy her forbidden cravings...and all the time in the world to do it.
author: Rebecca Lyndon
